tool_description: The API provides automated color correction and white balancing of photos.
name: Color Correction
title: Color Correction

api_list.name: Check Status and Error
api_list.description: This returns the job parameters including possible errors. Use this call if your retrieve GET returned 404 to learn more information about the reason.

required_parameters.name: secret
required_parameters.description: This is the secret password that you chose when submitting the image for color correction.

required_parameters.name: identifier
required_parameters.description: This is the numeric identifier assigned to your job when received by the server. It was provided to you in the response to your POST request.

api_list.name: Retrieve Finished Image
api_list.description: Retrieves an image which was successfully processed. It returns the image with 200 success code, or a 404 error if the image is not ready.

required_parameters.name: secret
required_parameters.description: This is the secret that you submitted your image for color correction.

required_parameters.name: identifier
required_parameters.description: This is the numeric identifier that we assigned to the job upon receiving it. It was returned to you in the response to you API call.
